RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 10500. FOR COLORADO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH DID NOT QUALIFY FOR THE FINAL. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHAVELAS BEST CARD driving finish. DG TIME FOR IVORY late kick. EYE ON PANAMA broke in, bumped, gamely. SPLASH TRAIN stumbled start, steady effort. GLADIADOR SPECIAL bumped, no factor. MS VOLCAN broke out, no threat.

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Gladiador Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Chavelas Best Card
ENTRY.COMMENT: driving finish

ENTRY.NAME: Dg Time for Ivory
ENTRY.COMMENT: late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Volcan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Splash Train
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, steady effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 10500. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH DID NOT QUALIFY FOR THE FINAL. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APOLLITICAL STREAKIN popped, best. SCHEDULE ME A ZOOM bumped, late kick. DON ARTURO C broke in, drifted in. ALL INTHE AVERAGE fought gamely. INTEREST IN UR EYES strong strides late. LITTLE WAGON hard to load, bobbled start. UNWAVERING drifted out, bumped. STOLINDREAM drifted in, good try. EL CAPITAN LEW erratic, veered out. FURIA CARTEL off slow, outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Unwavering
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, bumped

ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, outrun

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, late kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: popped, best

ENTRY.COMMENT: erratic, veered out

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, drifted in

ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, good try

ENTRY.NAME: Interest in Ur Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: strong strides late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 10700. FOR COLORADO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PUT PUT PUT raced in the middle of the pack through the turn then moved out to four wide at the top of the stretch an ran down the leader to be up in the final jumps. JAKE ON DAKAN rushed to a clear early lead then was headed at the quarter pole but came again, couldn't fend off the late closer and gave way grudgingly in the stretch. CHROMESIDSATION was allowed to settle at the back down the backstretch, made a rail bid around the turn then made a late surge on the rail for a late gain. RUNNIN BUFFALO was off the pace in the two path to the three furlong marked and slowly faded. OLD FASHION TIME settled in the middle of the pack on the backstretch then moved up from three wide at the three furlong marker but lacked the late response. GUTFIELD prompted the pace from the two path, moved up to engage the leader at the five sixteenths and fought gamely in early stretch but tired late. SILENCE'S NATION was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Jake On Dakan
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, headed 1/4, came again, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Runnin Buffalo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, slow fade

ENTRY.NAME: Old Fashion Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, bid 3w3/8, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Silence's Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromesidsation
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rail rid turn, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Put Put Put
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 4wupper, ran down leader, up final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Gutfield
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, engaged 5/16, gamely stretch, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS JAYLEEN was roused to the front to take the lead at the half mile marker then inched away around the turn and won going away. MISS IZZY BEE hopped leaving the gate and spotted the field several lengths, moved up between horses at the seven sixteenths pole and made a rail bid around the turn but started to tire at the top of the stretch but kept on to be second best. DAHLIA'S DANCER had good early speed but was over taken at the half mile marker, prompted the pace around the turn and weakened. BREAKFAST BALL tracked the leaders but was not a factor. PRESLEY'S ARTWORK was off the early pace and slowly dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Izzy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, between 7/16, rail bid turn, tired, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Presley's Artwork
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace early, slowly dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Jayleen
ENTRY.COMMENT: led 1/2, inched away turn, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Dahlia's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, prompt pace turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Breakfast Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S SMART ENOUGH was hustled away from the gate to set all the pace, pulled away to prove best. LADY PHYLLIS was off the pace on the inside to the turn, matched strides with LIL MISS DE BUY to the wire but was no match for the winner. LIL MISS DE BUY stalked the pace from between horses to the turn then dueled with LADY PHYLLIS to the wire and was outfinished. REMARKABLE CHARM raced near the back down the backstretch then saved ground around the turn to improve her position in the stretch. PROMPTLY DONE was forwardly placed from three wide to the three furlong marker then dropped back. EVIE had no speed and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Phyllis
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, dueled, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Remarkable Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, saved ground turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: She's Smart Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, set pace, pulled away, best

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Miss de Buy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace between, dueled, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Evie
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Promptly Done
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, dropped back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEET JOE was off the pace on the inside to the turn then moved up slightly to prompt the pace on the turn and ran down the leader in the final yards. ITS A DEAL sprinted to an unchallenged lead to set the pace but was caught in the final yards. RED WES was off the pace from between horses to the turn then fell back and was no match for the top two. BRON AND THE BROW was off the pace from three wide to the turn then fell back and was not match for the top two.

ENTRY.NAME: Meet Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, prompt pace turn, ran down leader

ENTRY.NAME: Red Wes
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace between, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Bron and the Brow
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3w, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Its a Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: unchallenged led, set pace, caught final yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 68. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $3500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $5000 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $6250. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colora do Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLO TIME was roused to the front to set the pace, edged away into the stretch and proved best. HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY settled in the middle of the pack, moved up from three wide around the turn and tipped out to five wide in upper stretch, was gaining late and was clearly second best. COLD AS YOU stalked the pace from the inside, moved up the rail around the turn then angled out to two wide in the stretch but lacked the late response needed. DIVA'S DIVA raced near the back then steadily advance up the rail to improve her position. SHE'S MY RIDE trailed through the turn and passed tiring rivals. LA ROSA DRIVE tracked the leaders in the early stages then moved up from four wide at the half mile marker and prompted the pace around the turn then weakened. AMERICAN REALITY prompted the early pace to the half mile marker then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Diva's Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, steady advance, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Flo Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to lead, set pace, edged away, best

ENTRY.NAME: American Reality
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt early pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Cold as You
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, angled out 2w, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: La Rosa Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4w1/2, prompt pace turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Happy Happy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wturn, 5wupper, late gain, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 5600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PICK A LANE FRANK pressed the pace from the two path then took the lead at the seven sixteenths pole, dueled to deep stretch then edged away and held on. FRIENDLY FOE went to the early lead but was eclipsed at the three furlong marker and tracked the leader to the top of the stretch, made a rebid at the eighth pole to be second best. CASH EXPRESS vied for the lead from four wide to the five furlong marker then tipped in to the two path at the three furlong marker and dueled to deep stretch but was outfinished. BUMPER POOL saved ground to no avail but passed tiring rivals. CAPTAIN COMEBACK rushed up to be forwardly placed from five wide the dropped back and finished evenly. ALL RISE UP was off the pace from three wide to the five furlong marker then dropped back, distanced, eased. ABRIERWIN was pulled up and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Friendly Foe
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, eclipsed 3/8, rebid 1/8, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Abrierwin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Pick a Lane Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led7/16, stretch duel, edged away, held on

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Shawna J Whiteside, Michael Harrington& Billy S Christian

ENTRY.NAME: Bumper Pool
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2-4w, dueled, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Comeback
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, forwardly 5w, dropped back, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: All Rise Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3w, dropped back, distanced, eased
